DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the utility of the nasogastric tube, which is used to decompress and as "guardian" of gastro-jejunal anastomosis, in patients undergoing distal subtotal gastrectomy for gastric cancer with reconstruction according to Billroth II or according Roux.
DOC.detailed_description: A silastic naso-gastric tube (RuschÂ® distributed by Teleflex Medical Srl) is used in the naso-gastric/jejunal tube group
DOC.criteria: All people subjected to subtotal gastrectomy for distal gastric adenocarcinoma. People undergoing enteral nutrition through nasojejunal tube
